Macros
HWA_SAMPLES_SIGN
HWA Driver External Data Structures » HWA_MACROS

Macros that define values for signed/unsigned property of input/output samples. More...

Macros

#define HWA_SAMPLES_UNSIGNED   ((uint8_t)0U)
 
#define HWA_SAMPLES_SIGNED   ((uint8_t)1U)
 

Detailed Description

Macros that define values for signed/unsigned property of input/output samples.

Macro Definition Documentation

#define HWA_SAMPLES_SIGNED   ((uint8_t)1U)

signed samples

#define HWA_SAMPLES_UNSIGNED   ((uint8_t)0U)

unsigned samples
